title: The mystry gift week
body: so it said if you gifted someone or yourself with 6 skins or something rito will give you an extra mystry gift. Will this be given soon? cause haven't received it. and I mystry gifted myself 13 times{{champion:83}}

replies.body:
Hey ItsMeGuy,
